snippet: Unlike its counterpart in the United States, the BBC is providing marathon live coverage during the Games, with 24 live feeds from different events.
abstract: BBC, unlike its American counterpart NBC, is providing marathon live coverage during the London Olympic Games, with 24 live feeds from different events and 2,500 hours of programming.
lead_paragraph: Unlike its counterpart in the United States, the BBC is providing marathon live coverage during the Games, with 24 live feeds from different events.

headline.seo: BBC’s Olympics Broadcasts Focus on Live Coverage
headline.main: With Live Streaming and New Technology, BBC Tries to Be Everywhere at the Olympics
headline.print_headline: With Live Streaming and New Technology, BBC Tries to Be Everywhere at the Olympics
